languages.text: "Помилуйте, стыд-то какой!" {n}Губернатор свешивается с лошади и хватает скомороха за руку. Вырвав из его хватки ключ, Руолдо замахивается на скомороха, прогоняя его прочь, после чего с почтительным поклоном вручает вам подарок.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Выдать FW_TesseraKey_item
Скоморох отбегает в сторону после этого куя

Выдать FW_TesseraKey_item
Скоморох отбегает в сторону после этого куя

languages.text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте, стыд-то какой!" {n}Губернатор свешивается с лошади и хватает скомороха за руку. Вырвав из его хватки ключ, Руолдо замахивается на скомороха, прогоняя его прочь, после чего с почтительным поклоном вручает вам подарок.{/n}

"Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，这真是太让人尴尬了！”{n}总督跳下了马，一把抓住小丑的手。他一只手夺过了小丑手中的钥匙，另一只手高高举起，作势要打。小丑见状，赶紧退了下去。到最后，总督恭敬地向你鞠了一躬，将手中的礼物递给了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，这真是太让人尴尬了！”{n}总督跳下了马，一把抓住小丑的手。他一只手夺过了小丑手中的钥匙，另一只手高高举起，作势要打。小丑见状，赶紧退了下去。到最后，总督恭敬地向你鞠了一躬，将手中的礼物递给了你。{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ、なんという恥さらしだ！」{n}総督は馬上から身をかがめて道化の手をつかんだ。ルオルドはブラフの手から無理やり鍵をもぎ取り、手を振り上げて殴ろうとしたが、道化はすばやくあとずさった。最後に、総督は恭しく一礼しながら、そのプレゼントをあなたに差し出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、なんという恥さらしだ！」{n}総督は馬上から身をかがめて道化の手をつかんだ。ルオルドはブラフの手から無理やり鍵をもぎ取り、手を振り上げて殴ろうとしたが、道化はすばやくあとずさった。最後に、総督は恭しく一礼しながら、そのプレゼントをあなたに差し出した。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ay, qué humillación!». {n}El gobernador se inclina desde la grupa de su caballo y agarra al bufón de la mano. Tras arrebatar la llave a Farol, Ruoldo levanta la mano para propinarle un golpe y el bufón retrocede rápidamente. Por último, el gobernador te ofrece él mismo el obsequio con una reverencia cortés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ay, qué humillación!». {n}El gobernador se inclina desde la grupa de su caballo y agarra al bufón de la mano. Tras arrebatar la llave a Farol, Ruoldo levanta la mano para propinarle un golpe y el bufón retrocede rápidamente. Por último, el gobernador te ofrece él mismo el obsequio con una reverencia cortés.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok utandım!" {n}Vali, atı üzerinde yana doğru eğilip soytarının elini yakalıyor. Anahtarı Kurusıkı'nın elinden kapıyor, ardından tokat atmak için elini kaldırıyor ama soytarı geri çekiliyor. En sonundaysa Vali, saygılı bir reveransla armağanı sana takdim ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çok utandım!" {n}Vali, atı üzerinde yana doğru eğilip soytarının elini yakalıyor. Anahtarı Kurusıkı'nın elinden kapıyor, ardından tokat atmak için elini kaldırıyor ama soytarı geri çekiliyor. En sonundaysa Vali, saygılı bir reveransla armağanı sana takdim ediyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Comment oses-tu, Bluff ?» {n}Le gouverneur, toujours juché sur sa monture, se penche et saisit la main du bouffon. Après lui avoir arraché la clé, Ruoldo lève la main dans l'intention de frapper son serviteur qui recule avec précipitation. Pour finir, le gouverneur vous offre le cadeau en s'inclinant respectueusement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comment oses-tu, Bluff ?» {n}Le gouverneur, toujours juché sur sa monture, se penche et saisit la main du bouffon. Après lui avoir arraché la clé, Ruoldo lève la main dans l'intention de frapper son serviteur qui recule avec précipitation. Pour finir, le gouverneur vous offre le cadeau en s'inclinant respectueusement.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, diese Peinlichkeit!" {n}Der Gouverneur beugt sich nach unten und packt den Narren an der Hand. Nachdem er Bluff den Schlüssel entwunden hat, hebt Ruoldo seine Hand zum Schlag und der Narr zieht sich eilig zurück. Schließlich überreicht dir der Gouverneur mit einer ehrfurchtsvollen Verbeugung den Schlüssel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, the embarrassment!" {n}The governor leans down from his horse and grabs the fool's hand. Having wrenched the key from Bluff's grasp, Ruoldo raises his hand to strike, and the fool quickly backs off. Finally, the governor offers the gift to you with a reverential bow.{/n}

Nachdem er Bluff den Schlüssel entwunden hat, hebt Ruoldo seine Hand zum Schlag und der Narr zieht sich eilig zurück. Schließlich überreicht dir der Gouverneur mit einer ehrfurchtsvollen Verbeugung den Schlüssel."
